en: Hey there, I'm Sasha. Welcome to the team!
Sasha leans in close, "[wave amp=10 freq=2][color=YELLOW]And keep your eyes peeled. Not everything is as it seems in Spud.[/color][/wave]"
Your next applicant is waiting. Check those stamps carefully! Any [color=YELLOW]suspicious behavior[/color] is to be reported.
Remember, a [color=DARK_ORANGE]dutiful officer[/color] has nothing to fear. Those who abandon their duty abandon their roots.
"...production numbers for [pulse freq=2][color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color][/pulse] are SKY HIGH. The miracle food continues to nourish our nation..."
"In other news, reports of [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]missing potatoes[/color][/tornado] continue..."
